alert.note: Alert for Northwestern Nye County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 12:26PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Nye County through 100 PM PDT... At 1222 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 24 miles east of Gabbs. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rainfall could cause higher than normal runoff in the Reese River Valley, Yomba Shoshone Tribal Lands, and Highway 21. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northern Nye County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
